item.title: How can i make all stats lvl 99
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
for(int Skill = 0; Skill < 23; Skill++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, Skill); 
}
sendMessage("Max levels ftw o.O"); 
}

replace the

Skill < 23;

with how many skills you have (i used to have extra skills and never bothered to remove them)

item.title: How can i make all stats lvl 99
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

Ok, so many people spamming here, stop it no need.

Ok, go into client.java and searchf or:

"god"

Under there you should see:

setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

Under neath all fo that code add this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); sendMessage("MESSAGE YOU WANT IT TO SEND ONCE MAXED."); }

This will make it so all admins (admins only) can tyoe ::master and become the max level, none other then admins if you wish to make it so mods/normals players can also do it then change the player rights accordingly.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make all stats lvl 99

item.title: How can i make all stats lvl 99
item.dc:creator: @iceyfang iceyfang
item.description:
@iceyfang wrote:

Um wow guys, stop fighting over this. I guess i’ll be the first to answer his question.

First, log into our server, then log out. go to your character file snd find your name. look at the to and you will see Char rights = 0. change this 0 to a 3.
log in and type ::master.
If that doesn’t work, this will.

Open up your character file, find your name
Go down untill you see character skills.
it will look like this(or something to this effect.

SkillLevel = 1 0
SkillLevel = 1 0
SkillLevel = 1 0
SkillLevel = 1 0
SkillLevel = 1 0

ETC.

change the 1’s to 99’ and the 0’s to 15,000,000’s.

By the way, GOD FORBID YOU TRAIN ON YOUR SERVER.

Read full topic
